name: Withering Flowers
description:
Hi! Welcome to the Withering Flowers page. This project is a personal effort that has been planned for some time. It's a short story of lesbian romance and adventure, which I always thought was a really fun combination. It's not a big production, but it's made with a lot of care - and I hope it can please you, who came here!

Genres: Visual Novel, Dating Sim, Fantasy, Adventure, Romance, Yuri, Choices Matter, Multiple Endings, RPG

Languages: English and Portuguese. 


In a world of spellcasters and sorcerers, Shira, a magical prodigy, made a bold choice that engendered dislike in her family - and dropped out of school to live with her girlfriend Laren. Her life seemed like a paradise, until the day her beloved suddenly asked for them to breakup, without an explanation. As if that weren't bad enough, she was immediately afflicted with a terrible illness that left her comatose.

Without a second thought, Shira sets out on a journey deep into the heart of the forest in search of her mysterious teacher Loic - and her estranged sister, the tyrant of flames. Along the way, she will be able to count on the help of her dear but cowardly friend Luka, as well as a powerful and daring rival named Jareth. Her goal is to find answers, a cure for Laren, and if possible, a way to mend their relationship in the process.



Others:

Luka, Laren's brother;

Loic, professor at the academy of magic;

Thaltra, Shira's sister and Loic's wife;

Phia, Shira's niece and Loic's daughter;


- 30k words of story;

- Story with choices that affect how it unfolds later on;

- Characters with unique personalities and motivations;

- A narrative that mixes romance and fantasy adventure;

- Multiple endings;

Screenplay, artwork and development: B.G. Riccetto

General (and emotional) support: M.Graymoon

Backgrounds: Original VN Maker and DLCs

Sounds and Musics: Original VN Maker, Tapatilorenzo, Dansevenstar, DJSound FX, Antumdeluge, Kenney and Kurt

Special thanks to M.Graymoon. If it weren't for the support, guidance and advice, this work would not have left my lonely imagination ❤️
